sense.def:
Kar je
nasty
, je zelo neprijetno.

seg.quote: This place has a nasty smell.
I got a nasty feeling that I was being followed.

sense.def:
Za stvari rečemo, da so
nasty
, če se nam zdijo neprivlačne ali neokusne.

seg.quote: It's a tacky, nasty little movie.

sense.def:
Težava ali vprašanje, ki je
nasty
, je težavno.

seg.quote: This presented a nasty problem to Mayor Lindsay.

sense.def:
Bolezen ali poškodba je
nasty
, če je resna ali zelo neprijetna na pogled.

seg.quote: A nasty bruise rose where the handbag had landed.

sense.def:
Za človekovo vedenje rečemo, da je
nasty
, kadar se vede neprijazno in grobo.

seg.quote: Why must she be so nasty to me?
He was staring at them nastily.
